summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3671 , for the improvement of the alley in block 31, Law's Addition to the City of Seattle, and in Block 3, D.M. Crane's Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley between 16th Avenue North and 17th Avenue North, from East Thomas Street to East Harrison Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45269, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
